name: Brontosaurus

action.name: Stomp
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 27 (5d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Tail
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 32 (6d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

description:
This massive four-legged dinosaur is large enough that most predators leave it alone. Its deadly tail can drive away or kill smaller threats.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 139, Tomb of Annihilation
